TopicTitle: Maneuver nodes - Explaining what all the symbols do to your orbit. Limited jargon.

Articles.Content:
Orbital mechanics are not intuitive.

Here is a simple to understand video showing you all six maneuvers and how they affect your orbit.

The main goal of this video is to NOT use too much aerospace jargon and explain the various forces you can apply to your spacecraft in an easy-to-understand format.

I hope this is helpful.
